https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hDuYlLFSkYO2ex8k5GfYXJnibf6.jpg Three teenage friends get in way over their head when they cross a down-home crime syndicate. They hope to make a break for it and escape their dead-end existence in a cotton-mill town but get sucked into the seedy underbelly of organized crime when one of them steals from the wrong man. Bad Turn Worse
